## Prompt

![](https://99percentinvisible.org/app/uploads/2021/02/Diagram_of_the_causes_of_mortality_in_the_army_Wellcome_L0041105-728x474.jpg)

Florence Nightingale is a well known data visualization pioneer. She is famously known for her rose diagram (above).

## Instructions

In order to meet the conditions of the contract for this activity, you must:

+ Listen to the 99% Invisible podcast on Florence Nightingale: <https://99percentinvisible.org/episode/florence-nightingale-data-viz-pioneer/>
+ Find the data set online (include link to the data set).
+ Recreate the rose diagram using your software of choice to the best of your abilities.
+ Create a stacked bar plot and compare to the rose diagram.
+ Write: Discuss the story and argue why Florence needed the rose diagram.

> You will submit a pdf to Canvas which includes a link to the data you used, the two charts you created, and your written discussion and argument.
